Madeline Cowden

  1. Foster Name: Della (Delia)
  2. Foster Family: H. J. Sloss
  3. Location of Family: Blue Springs, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Tecumseh, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 6
  7. Date of Birth: 7/9/1907, Brooklyn, NE
  8. Date of Death: 12/1/2000, Hastings, NE
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Della Mann
  11. Spouse Name: Charles Mann
  12. Source: Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories Vol. 4 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 235-242; Tecumseh Chieftain, 17 October 1914; Find-A-Grave for Della Sloss Cowden Mann; National Orphan Train Complex; 1920 United States Federal Census; Grand Island Independent, 3 May 1993.
